document_data.deathnotes: early or late previous year, slain by Mirt the Merciless
document_data.mainbody:
Borold was a guard in Waterdeep in the early 14 century DR.
He was married to Nalitheen. They had two daughters, Boroldira and Naleetha.
He was slain two summers prior to Eleint of , suggesting it was before summer of 1321 and 1320 as well, in a campaign in which pirates of Amn, led by Mirt the Merciless, pillaged a cargo of silver bars belonging to the Lords of Waterdeep.
His wife Nalitheen, still with two daughters, became destitute, and took to street work to make ends meet. She later met Mirt the Merciless, whom she almost knifed.
